name: Mage Mine
description:
INFO:

This was a college project that we made, it's just a quick little demo! You are a mage, and you mine!

CREDITS:

Art and Concept by PixelPingPong

Programming & sounds by AAcat

Modeling by the both of us.

(Background floating islands & TNT modeled by a guy named Zackary)

CONTROLS (how to play):

alt+f4 - exit the game

WASD - movement

Mouse - look around

Left click - interact/use item

12345 - select element type

Q - Select pickaxe

E - Select TNT

X - Place crystal
